default: 4 fresh mackerel fillets, skin on but bones removed
100g/4oz fine noodles, cooked according to instructions on packet

steps: In a large pan fry off the red curry paste for a few seconds before adding the coconut milk, stock, finely chopped red chilli, fish sauce and sugar. Bring to the boil and turn down the heat before adding the mackerel pieces. Continue to simmer gently until the fish is cooked through.
Warm the noodles and place into the soup bowls. Spoon the finished broth over the top and sprinkle with freshly torn coriander leaves, together with the juice and zest of the limes.
title: Thai curry with mackerel and noodles
